review.reviewBody: Everything was good and the size was perfect for late night food . Only wish they add plain rice to the menu for late night .
雅菀招牌雞 (1/2) House Special Chicken  was extremely dry, would not recommend
Duck was alright but weird microwaved taste. Noodles were so dry you could break them like raw pasta, not edible.

I'm grateful for the time put into making and sending thus meal to my house but none of these items were worth spending the amount of money that I did on them. Maybe the difference between delivery vs eating in-restaurant is a factor but the pork was more fat than meat and the rice was very dry for a fried rice dish - I ended up just throwing most of it out.
